sentence.text: In clinical studies, Tilade has been co-administered with other anti-asthma medications, including inhaled and oral bronchodilators, and inhaled corticosteroids, with no evidence of increased frequency of adverse events or laboratory abnormalities.
sentence.negationtags: In clinical studies, Tilade has been co-administered with other anti-asthma medications, including inhaled and oral bronchodilators, and inhaled corticosteroids, with <xcope><cue>no</cue> evidence of increased frequency of adverse events or laboratory abnormalities</xcope>.

sentence.text: No formal drug-drug interaction studies, however, have been conducted.
sentence.negationtags: <xcope><cue>No</cue> formal drug-drug interaction studies</xcope>, however, have been conducted.
